```{r}
Wake_county <- read.csv("http://tiny.cc/dcf/street-addresses.csv")

download.file(url = "http://tiny.cc/dcf/CMS_ProvidersSimple.rds", destfile = "YourNameForTheFile.rds")
```

```{r}

pattern <- "(ST|RD|ROAD|CIRCLE|WAY|TRAIL|LN|AVE|DR|CIR|DRIVE|CT|PO BOX)" # this sets our pattern for which types of street words we are looking for
LeftOvers <- # This names our function
  Wake_county %>% # This is the data we are using
  filter( ! grepl(pattern, address), ! grepl(" BOX", address)) # this filters out addresses that have street names fitting our pattern

LeftOvers
```
